subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Until this week, David Pauley had come nowhere near Yankee Stadium, in either the literal or the figurative sense. He entered last night's game against the Yankees as a middling prospect called up from Class AA to fill a gap in the Red Sox' rotation while David Wells recovered from a bruised knee, and he seemed destined to serve as cannon fodder, even against the crippled Yankees lineup.
